subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|水|alt1=氵|t1=water|益|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}} – an overflowing liquid, water. {{zh-l|益}} also has sense of “to increase”, hence connotation of “increase to point of overflowing”.
